sentences.en: a college of agriculture and horticulture
A large part of the workforce is employed in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 劳动人口中一大部分受雇于农业.

sentences.en: Agriculture forms the backbone of the rural economy.
sentences.cn: 农业是农村经济的基础。

sentences.en: Agriculture was based in the past on the family as a unit.
sentences.cn: 过去的农业是以家庭为单位的。

sentences.en: As agriculture developed, agricultural ideas diffused across Europe.
sentences.cn: 随着农业的发展，农业知识开始在欧洲普及。

sentences.en: European agriculture ministers failed to break the deadlock over farm subsidies.
sentences.cn: 欧洲各国农业部长在农业补贴问题上未能打破僵局。

sentences.en: He forced the country to collectivize agriculture.
sentences.cn: 他强迫该国对农业实行公有化。

sentences.en: He showed his poverty in his knowledge of agriculture.
sentences.cn: 他表现出缺乏对农业知识的了解.

sentences.en: Kaspar had spoken know-ledgeably about the state of agriculture in Europe.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕对欧洲农业状况发表了一番颇有见地的见解。

sentences.en: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
The conditions were unfavourable for agriculture.
The Farmers' Club is an organisation for people involved in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 农场主俱乐部是为农业界人士创办的组织。

sentences.en: The number of people employed in agriculture has fallen in the last decade.
sentences.cn: 过去十年，农业从业人数已经下降。

sentences.en: The Ukraine is strong both in industry and agriculture.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰的工业和农业都很发达。

sentences.en: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.
sentences.cn: 这会对农业和食物链造成威胁，由此而危及人的健康。

sentences.en: We are speeding up the mechanisation of our agriculture.
sentences.cn: 我们正在加快农业机械化的步伐.

words.tran_cn: 农业家；[农] 农场工作者

trans.tran_en: the practice or science of farming
